about_the_game:
STORY:

In a galaxy far, far away, the peaceful Pizza-verse faces its greatest threat yet as the malevolent Falagans, a race of extraterrestrial beings with a disdain for all things pizza, embark on a ruthless campaign to conquer the solar system and forever eradicate the beloved dish from existence.

With pizza-loving civilizations trembling in fear, hope emerges in the form of the Piamia, a legendary spacecraft renowned for its unparalleled speed and firepower. The Piamia stands as the last bastion of defense against the Falagan onslaught.

As the Piamia embarks on a perilous journey through the cosmos, they must confront the relentless Falagan forces, thwart their sinister plans, and try to preserve the legacy of pizza for generations to come. The fate of the Pizza-verse is an inevitable collapse, but hopefully the Piamia will stand strong for just a bit longer before the Falagans win.

GAMEPLAY:

Galactic Slice is a space shooter style bullet hell game, where you blast enemies and get as many points as possible. Use the WASD keys to move and the Spacebar to shoot, and try to get powerups and items along the way. You play as The Piamia, a powerful spaceship that..... oddly looks like a pizza slice? Anyway, the goal of the game is to not only to get the most points possible, but to also slay bosses and Falagans, which are your prime enemies. But be warned! There is a time-limit! So (as stated before) try and get the most amount of points you can before something tries to finish you off with the rest of the Pizza-verse......

short_description: Galactic Slice sci-fi shooter game all about pizza, you use the WASD keys to move & the spacebar to shoot. Galactic Slice is all about an alien race wanting to destroy & ruin pizza forever, which simply cannot happen! Your job is to eliminate the aliens & save all pizzakind.
